import React from 'react' import { Row, Col } from 'react-materialize' import ContentEditable from 'react-contenteditable' const SnippetView = ({snippetId, snippets}) => { const div = { height: '40vh', width: '100%', padding: '5%', background: 'rgb(48,48,48)', border: '3px solid teal', color: 'white', borderRadius: '12px', overflow: 'scroll', } const bottomDiv = { height: '40vh', width: '100%', marginTop: '2%', background: 'white', border: '5px solid teal', color: 'white', borderRadius: '12px', overflow: 'scroll', textAlign: 'center', justifyContent: 'center' } const foundSnippet = () => { return snippets.find(snip =>{ return snip.id === snippetId }) } return (
{ (snippets.length>0) && foundSnippet().html }
{ (snippets.length>0) && foundSnippet().css }
0) ? foundSnippet().html : "
"} // innerHTML of the editable div disabled={false} // use true to disable editing />
) } export default SnippetView;
